LanguageData.R3_AllowHarvested.label: harvested
LanguageData.R3_AllowHarvested.description: Allow corpses with no remaining added parts or implants.
LanguageData.R3_AllowUnharvested_Advanced.label: unharvested (advanced)
LanguageData.R3_AllowUnharvested_Advanced.description: Allow corpses with remaining added parts or implants of advanced complexity that could be reclaimed.
LanguageData.R3_AllowUnharvested_Glittertech.label: unharvested (glittertech)
LanguageData.R3_AllowUnharvested_Glittertech.descript: Allow corpses with remaining added parts or implants of Glittertech complexity that could be reclaimed.
LanguageData.R3_AllowUnharvested_Primitive.label: unharvested (primitive)
LanguageData.R3_AllowUnharvested_Primitive.descriptio: Allow corpses with remaining added parts or implants of primitive complexity that could be reclaimed.
